title.#text: New Genome Sequence of an  Endophyte,  sp. Strain EpSL27, Able To Inhibit Human-Opportunistic Pathogens.

abstract: {'i': ['Arthrobacter', 'Echinacea purpurea'], '#text': 'We announce here the draft genome sequence of  sp. strain EpSL27, isolated from the stem and leaves of the medicinal plant  and able to inhibit human-pathogenic bacterial strains. The genome sequencing of this strain may lead to the identification of genes involved in the production of antimicrobial molecules.'}
